name: commit-guard
description: Plug-and-play pre-commit security pipeline that automatically scans for secrets, linting errors, and IaC misconfigurations before any code reaches your repo.

name: console-to-code
description: Browser extension that detects what you're doing in the AWS console and suggests the equivalent Terraform or CLI command in a sidebar in real time.

name: repo-intel-bot
description: Microsoft Teams bot that lets your team mention a repository and ask questions about specific areas of the codebase, returning contextual answers directly in the thread.
